entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:55AM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ACTIVE WEATHER PATTERN AND TRAVEL IMPACTS STARTING TUESDAY, LIKELY EXTENDING THROUGH THE REMAINDER OF THE YEAR.... A series of Pacific winter storms will bring periods of stormy weather to much of California and Nevada next week. There will be few, if any, meaningful breaks in the weather for the Sierra once the storms begin on Tuesday, so plan ahead.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Mono; Surprise Valley California
